description: This file is a Vue.js composition function (composable) that manages user authentication state and actions such as login, signup, logout, and check authentication status.

methods.name: export function useAuth() { useAuth
methods.description: Provides authentication-related methods and state management for a Vue.js application.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Returns the current authenticated user object.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs a login operation with given email and password.

methods.name: signup
methods.description: Performs a signup operation with given email and password.

methods.name: checkAuth
methods.description: Checks if a user is authenticated, possibly refreshing session or token.
